did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Elizabeth Lyman, collector, theater and concert programs, 1898-1954.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Programs mainly for productions presented on the Cornell University campus and Ithaca Conservatory, Ithaca College, churches, public schools, movie theaters, and elsewhere in the city of Ithaca, N.Y.; also scattered items from New York City, Salt Lake City, Watkins Glen [N.Y.] Summer Theatre, and Hollywood.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Programs mainly for productions presented on the Cornell University campus and Ithaca Conservatory, Ithaca College, churches, public schools, movie theaters, and elsewhere in the city of Ithaca, N.Y.; also scattered items from New York City, Salt Lake City, Watkins Glen [N.Y.] Summer Theatre, and Hollywood.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Elizabeth Lyman, collector, theater and concert programs, #2239. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: All the material in the collection may not be covered by this guide.
